term.title: medium-pressure mercury lamp

item.text: Non-coherent radiation source containing mercury vapour at pressures ranging from 50 to several hundred kPa (1 atm = 101.325 kPa). Emits mostly from 200 to 1000 nm with the most intense lines approximately at 218, 248, 254, 266, 280, 289, 297, 303, 313, 334, 366, 406, 408, 436, 546 and 578 nm.
